mapper.update: update t_user set zn_name=#{znName}, email=#{email}, telphone=#{telphone}, where account=#{account}
mapper.select: select tu.user_id as userId, tu.account as account, tu.zn_name as znName, tu.email as email, tu.telphone as telphone, tg.group_name as groupName, tr.role_name as roleName from t_user as tu left join t_user_group as tug on tu.user_id = tug.user_id left join t_group as tg on tug.group_id = tg.group_id left join t_user_role as tur on tu.user_id = tur.user_id left join t_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tu.account = #{account}
